original_text: But Sihon would not allow Israel to pass through his territory. He gathered all his people together and went out against Israel to the wilderness and came to Jahaz and fought against Israel.
korean_text: 시혼이 이스라엘이 자기 영토로 지나감을 용납하지 아니하고 그의 백성을 다 모아 이스라엘을 치러 광야로 나와서 야하스에 이르러 이스라엘을 치므로

sentences.original_text: But Sihon would not allow Israel to pass through his territory.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 시혼은 이스라엘이 자기 영토를 통과하도록 허락하지 않았다.

sentences.original_text: He gathered all his people together
and went out against Israel to the wilderness
